title: Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies: Narrative-Based Project for Designing Online Physical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three major issues (technical, design, and adaptability) that arise when designing online physical education classes.
Learners can propose specific strategies for utilizing ICT tools in designing physical education projects under limited technological environments.
Learners can systematically evaluate online physical education experiences and derive improvement plans by applying narrative analysis techniques.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
